channel.title: How do i get a hamatchi?
channel.description: A lot of servers say (HAM)...I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT MEANS AND HOW TO GET IT!!!

item.title: How do i get a hamatchi?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

ok first download it off this site http://www.hamachi.cc/download/

once you have it on your computer open and choose you name that people see.

find a server that you want that says [ham][pass]

click on the triange in the bottom right hand coner and join existing network

type in the name of that server and the password

once youve done that it will come up with a list of ip’s

go back to the thread copy the ip and put it in your moparscape

then play

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get a hamatchi?
